definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: Sennacherib (= Sin-aḫê-irba, Sin multiplied brothers, Schr:COT 2 K 18, 13);—son of Sargon and father of Esarhaddon, king of Assyria (B. C. 705–681; cf. Tiele:Gesch. 285 ff.); 2Ki 18:13, 2Ki 19:16, 2Ki 19:20, 2Ki 19:36 = Is 36:1, Is 37:17, Is 37:21, Is 37:37, 2Ch 32:1, 2Ch 32:2, 2Ch 32:9, 2Ch 32:10, 2Ch 32:22 (all as above, exc. [[סַנְחֵרִב]] 2Ki 19:20 ); (LXX Sennaxhreim, LXXL Sennaxeireim; Senaxh/ribov Jos:Ant. x. 1 ff.; Sanaxa/rbon (acc.) Herodot.:ii. 141.
